Bio

I am a senior undergrad at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, majoring in Computer Science. For fall 2015, I am pursuing an research internship at Cornell NLP group, working with Prof. Claire Cardie.

I am interested in machine learning, natural language processing and algorithmic game theory. I am exciting about discovering exciting problems and devising core techniques. Here is my CV.

Deep Learning for Fine-grained Opinion Extraction

Research intern at Cornell NLP group, supervised by Prof. Claire Cardie.
